name.description: Unique name or ID of this section.
name.comment: If used as a page section, ideally should be page path with slashes converted to dots, plus hash ('#'), plus unique CSS-compatible identifier (for HTML element ID), e.g. 'help.faq#how_do_i_setup_account'. If is a Search Info Header, should be URL-compatible so can request e.g. search-info-header.WorkflowRun --> '/static-section/search-info-header.WorkflowRun'.
name.title: Unique Identifier

___default_open.description: Whether this StaticSection should appear as expanded by default (in places where it may be collapsible). Does not necessarily depend on 'collapsible' being true, e.g. in lists where all sections are explicitly collapsible.
___default_open.title: Is Expanded by Default

___collapsible.description: Whether this StaticSection should be collapsible (wherever collapsibility is an option). This property is ignored in some places, e.g. lists where all sections are explicitly collapsible.
___collapsible.title: Is Collapsible

___image.description: Image or screenshot URL for this Item to use as a preview.
___image.title: Preview Image

___title_icon.description: Icon to be showed next to title in selected places.
___title_icon.title: Title Icon

contributing_labs.description: Other labs associated with the submitted data.
contributing_labs.title: Contributing Labs

items.description: A lab that has contributed to the associated data.
items.title: Contributing Lab
